content: Meh! I'm glad I live where I do! Here, we don't really have either "gun-nuts" or "anti gun-nuts;" we just have people who either own guns or don't and those who do own guns (yes, I do) use them for hunting or target-shooting; very rarely does anybody up here feel the need to own them for "self-defense!" And, yes; many do have CCW, but they rarely do (carry)! It's more recognition of a legality than it is a need! Just to pick a nit; they should refer to it as a "lay-in" rather than a "lie-in;" the latter sounds vaguely devious! Of course, the former makes it sound like an orgy! It is not our belief or disbelief that can make or unmake the fact. ~ Thomas Paine
